subject: Re: Flock accounts
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi det, 

That is a great question. Let me loop in Jaime who can help. FYI she is impacted by the bad weather in PNW so she may be a bit delayed in her response. 

On Thu, Nov 21, 2024 at 11:53?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Good afternoon,

	 

	I gained access to the Flock system today.  I have had a chance to watch some videos and I am joining in on the group admin training session starting at noon.  The on thing I was curious about is that I can see the location of PD�s that have flock but I can�t see private entities that have Flock.  Is there a method in obtaining access to these private companies or at least knowing which private companies in Oregon have these cameras to start a request process?

	
	Derek

	https://www.google.com/maps/search/Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+OR+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

	 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road https://www.google.com/maps/search/Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+OR+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

	Eugene, OR 97401 https://www.google.com/maps/search/Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+OR+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192
